description: Best of the best! FinTech Associate (Junior/Mid-Level) @ Leading Tech-Focused Juggernaut We are seeking a Junior to Mid-Level Associate to join a Chambers and Partners ranked FinTech practice at a leading tech-focused juggernaut. This role focuses on transactional FinTech matters and offers a fantastic opportunity for someone looking to transition from a traditional practice into the dynamic FinTech space. Ideal candidates will have a strong legal background and a desire to differentiate themselves for an eventual move in-house. The position is flexible in terms of location, allowing you to work from where you are most productive. This is a unique chance to join a top-tier practice, gain exposure to cutting-edge FinTech transactions, and work with leading clients in the industry. Candidates should possess strong analytical skills, a keen interest in FinTech, and the ability to handle complex legal matters.
